text: A duet is a musical composition for two performers, most often used for a vocal or piano duet. For other instruments, the word duo is often used. The word duet is used in any of the following ways: *a pair of musicians playing the same musical instrument, *a pair of musicians playing different instruments, *the performance of a song by two people, *a piece of music that can be performed by two people, *as a general term for any activity done by two people. ==References== * Category:Music
title: Duet
